website_summaries.verdict: This 100% recycled set has something for everyone's needs.
pros: Comes with 3 different sized, well-organized baskets to cover all of your needs
Originally designed for baby bottles and accessories, but can be used for much more
The round basket is perfect for small items such as wine bottle stoppers and mason jar lids
Baskets are made from 100% recycled plastic
cons: Round basket takes up a lot of space in relation to the size of items it holds

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Bottle Baskets
customer_reviews.text: I was having a hard time finding bottle baskets that weren't brand specific. This set is so perfect for my bottle cleaning needs! It has a smaller basket for the tiny parts. A medium basket and a larger basket. The small basket even has a holder you can clip to your dishwasher so the water doesn't make it fly around. Brilliant! And so handy!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit and effective.
customer_reviews.text: The baskets fit snuggly in our Whirpool dishwasher and hold pump parts, bottle rings, and bottle nipples for effective cleaning. I find that it is best to use the medium-sized basket for nipples and other smaller items (i.e. duckbills pump part) for better washing. The large basket is great for bottle rings, Medela storage caps, pacifiers like, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel M.

customer_reviews.title: Gotta clean them baby bottles
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for me when I would use the dishwasher to wash bottles/caps/nipples/bottle nipple collars. Other than that, I would just take it off to use the dishwasher as my drying rack. (Yes...I am an Vietnamese women who uses her dishwasher as a large drying rack haha). The only thing I don't really use in this order is the tube cleaner. The water tends to always get stuck in the tubes so I throw it away and not risk having it mold. I often use the other baskets in this order and would recommend them to our other baby parents friends.
customer_reviews.author: LeAn

customer_reviews.title: Overall worth it
customer_reviews.text: Pros: this comes with two larger baskets that fit lots of stuff! The smaller basket fits pretty much anywhere in the dishwasher. Cons: the circular basket is of no use to me. I also wish the slits in the baskets were a little smaller. Some of my medicine syringes fall through the baskets, which is the opposite of their purpose! The latches sometimes don't stay closed, so I have to be vigilant so they don't come open during my dishwasher's wash cycle. Overall, they are cheaper baskets, so I didnt expect them to be perfect. They function well enough and I think they are worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon B.

customer_reviews.title: Prince Lionhart Complete Dishwasher Basket System
customer_reviews.text: Great dishwasher basket set, good variety of baskets for different uses. I put a 3 piece small beverage shaker inside one of the baskets laying them side by side inside the basket and put it on the top rack of the dishwasher and when the cycle was finished, none of shaker pieces moved or got thrown around. The baskets are sturdy enough but a little flexible and the set is worth the money and it's probably a giftable item for those people who use dishwashers on a regular basis. I am very happy with my purchase and definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: oscar

customer_reviews.title: So glad I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Even though I don't have children, I have small items that need to be cleaned in the dishwasher and these have been great for that purpose. They fit it in the washer nicely and stay closed. I'm so glad I ordered the set.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Pea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for lids and more
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to find a container for small lids, measuring cups and other items that would otherwise fall through the rack. The lid opens in the middle and is secure in closing. It is all plastic so no issues with rusting. I am only using one of the three as it's the perfect size of what I was needing.
customer_reviews.author: EllenTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit as much is I’d expect
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t fit that many bottles and one of the baskets is sort of useless because it’s so small it barely fits the nipples but it’s still a great value for the money. I end up loading bottles and flanges of my pump parts in the dishwasher without the basket and use the baskets for nipples and tops of bottles as well as the back flow protection covers of my pump.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: good buy so far for our Comotomo bottles
customer_reviews.text: the plastic seems flimsy but still gonna try them out.. the Larger ones seem very spacious and fits 3 of our ComoTomo bottle a time, the 5oz and 8oz fit well; the bottle lids we put in w the bottles as there is room.... the medium allows for 3 comotomo nipples to be washed at once; along w his pacifiers to be washed underneath..... the small circular one holds the collars for the bottles perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: ladydragon

customer_reviews.title: Used for so much more
customer_reviews.text: Great not just for baby stuff but also for the small thing like bottle tops and canning tops etc. I recycle jars of all sizes for my vegan products that I buy in bulk. This make cleaning some of the small cover and rings that come with them without having to take up silverware space. Really good size so u can do a lot at one time.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Really good for the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.text: Holds those little things that drop through the trays in the dishwasher. I took the bottom off the middle one as I do not have a baby in the house and to allow better water flow. I have not used the large one yet as it is very large. I love the middle one!
customer_reviews.author: Dory

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these baskets
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these baskets. I was using so much water handwashing all the pieces to my Dr Brown bottles. This lets me put every small piece in the basket so they don’t fall through the dishwasher holes that are in the rack and I can keep it on the top rack instead of the bottle so they don’t get too hot. I’m not sure if they would morph but now I don’t have to find out.
customer_reviews.author: Alice K

customer_reviews.title: Be safe out there America.
customer_reviews.text: These have helped us out tremendously. We have so many small little nick nack items that need cleaning like medicine cups, reusable straws and the occasional chopsticks that having a basket to place everything in keeps it from falling through the grate of the silver ware basket that came with our dishwasher. I also like the spinning sippy cup spout holder, if you aren't removing these rubber stoppers from your kids sippy cups and washing them, you could be storing old grody liquids that don't get cleaned out thoroughly if you don't remove them from the lid. Be safe out there America.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Martin

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it if your using it to wash nipples
customer_reviews.text: If you’re buying this to wash nipples and bottles , don’t do it. It doesn’t thoroughly clean the nipples no matter what way you put them. There’s this like foggy film after it comes out of the dishwasher. I should’ve returned it .
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Garrity

customer_reviews.title: Life savers
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad we bought these. We use a variety of bottles but the Dr Brown nipples fit perfectly in the bottom portion. We are able to put lids and pieces of the bottles in the rest of the compartments and just place in the dishwasher. They fit perfectly on the top rack where you'd place your cups. They are a little flimsy but as long as you aren't trying to jam too many things into them then there shouldn't be a problem. I would recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Saves me precious time!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for washing bottles. It cuts down on our bottle washing time by half. I'm SO glad I bought these! BTW, we use Playtex Ventaire bottles. The wide nipples don't fit in the bottom rows, but the regular nips do. If you have a few wide nipples, just fit them in the top. We actually have 13 bottles, and the bottom only holds 8, so I just squeeze the rest on top next to the blue things. I use the larger basket to toss the base, the ring, and a few caps into. Then I just place the remaining caps around the top rack wherever they fit. Saves a lot of time, and everything gets clean!
customer_reviews.author: Chica!

customer_reviews.title: Does It's Job, But Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: The baskets function, but the lids don't snap very securely and I can tell they will need some careful handling or they will break.
customer_reviews.author: Judge

customer_reviews.title: Handy for any household!
customer_reviews.text: I bought for washing reusable coffee pods in the dishwasher. Works great for this and for washing other small items.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: These are a great value for the money. I’ve used them numerous times on the top shelf of dishwasher, and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Good for odds and ends but really for baby bottles and things like that.
customer_reviews.text: It is okay - can only use one part of it for what I use it for, but then some of the parts are for baby bottle parts. They are good for little odds and ends in the dishwasher
customer_reviews.author: maryquitecontrary

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: The sizes are a little bit random. But they work pretty well for safely holding smaller more delicate items on the top rack.
customer_reviews.author: D. P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cleaning your
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for washing all the small pieces to all the bottles, pumping supplies & sippy cup valves in dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Thrower

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Must have. Huge time saver when you’re making bottles for two all day long! Can fit parts for about 8 bottles in at once.
customer_reviews.author: Joei

customer_reviews.title: Great baskets for bottles and parts
customer_reviews.text: Agree with much of the positive reviews here, and wanted to add that the baskets are slender enough across to fit our standard dishwasher top rack without straddling wires, which I was a little worried about. Taking away one star because the nipples undertray is great but tends to squish the nipples a bit when you close it -- either I'm not loading properly or the nipples are too big (? because they're newborn) or it's just a bit shorter than it needs to be. Still, everything seems to get clean and I'd say this is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: diane page

customer_reviews.title: So easy!
customer_reviews.text: These are a lifesaver to save time with bottles. Just load em up & put them them in the washer.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: work great
customer_reviews.text: Use these just about every night to sanitize bottles and they still working just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jer

customer_reviews.title: Very useful !
customer_reviews.text: Great variety. Each bin fits well and we use them for the baby bottle parts, straws, small plastic lids etc
customer_reviews.author: jd

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly, exactly what I wanted. I needed it to wash small items (jewelry, etc). It has a snug cover and fits into my diswasher pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: cleo

customer_reviews.title: Handy set. I use the larger one to store ...
customer_reviews.text: Handy set. I use the larger one to store parts to a food processor. It protects from sharp, the medium one for little lids and parts in the dishwasher and the other I gave to my daughter to use for toddler sipper cup straws and lids.
customer_reviews.author: MimiinAZ

customer_reviews.title: Such a time saver!
customer_reviews.text: We love these for washing baby bottles and other little baby items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not large enough.
customer_reviews.text: Made more for baby bottle products. I wanted larger utensil baskets.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, works well.
customer_reviews.text: Very reasonably priced, and pretty much all the random bits and parts that we need for our daughter fit inside, stay in the proper position for optimal cleaning, and don't end up rattling around the bottom of the dishwasher. We lost 2 different bottle parts to the heating ring at the bottom of the dishwasher, not to mention all the times parts didn't get cleaned because they flipped over and filled with water. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Rob R

customer_reviews.title: Good So Far
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much daily use for the last 3 months and seems to be doing the job, no issues
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lemermeier

customer_reviews.title: Just the ticket
customer_reviews.text: It holds all of the parts for my dr. Brown's bottles and my pump parts. Everything gets squeaky clean inside, no complaints. I couldn't have asked for better
customer_reviews.author: Alex & Candy

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product and I thought I needed it
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product and I thought I needed it, but really I could use one of the three cups, but all three was a bit too cumbersome, so we ended up returning it and buying just one bucket.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: I like these baskets.
customer_reviews.text: I am using the bigger one more right now since we are using sippies. In a few days I will also be using it for bottles too. I like how you have options on which basket to use. The bigger one holds quit a bit and I have 3 using sippies right now. Not sure about the round thing. I think you could use it for just about anything you need it to be. I haven't had a reason to use it yet.
customer_reviews.author: CRhine

customer_reviews.title: Great for odds and ends
customer_reviews.text: So, after a while you get over hand-washing all the kids stuff. This set is excellent, it has three baskets. One small for valves and the such, and it has an apparatus to attach to the rack, to keep it from rolling away. A smaller basket has an under catch for nipples and the such. The big basket has lots of room. Holding up very well, no issues. Made in the USA! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tadao Baba

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I've used these for over a year and they're still like mint new. I don't use the round one but the two rectangular ones work great for the Dr. Brown Bottles. The bottle nipples and piece get cleaned well. I have no complaints. Highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: WorkingMama

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Works perfectly for 6 small Dr. Brown bottles at a time.
customer_reviews.author: ABC987

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful
customer_reviews.text: This product is good for washing baby items but also mouth pieces for other cups as well
customer_reviews.author: No One

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I got these to wash popsicle kits in my dishwaser without having the plastic pieces scattered at the bottom of my dishwasher, partially melted, after a wash cycle. I'd highly recommend this to anyone who has fiddly plastic bits that they need to run through a dishwasher that will easily slip through the racks.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Super high capacity
customer_reviews.text: Amazing capacity with system, perfect for keeping all parts of bottles contained
customer_reviews.author: KCgilly

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made but the product does work and I can ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made but the product does work and I can for a ton of items in the dishwasher using these
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Salazar

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: Have the two larger baskets all loaded in the dishwasher with silicone muffin cups. Looks sturdy and well made. I like the design. Ill probably use at least one basket in every load. The smaller round basket isnt as useful since there are no babies in the house but still very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kerinny

customer_reviews.title: Great dishwashing basket for all baby products!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and fits my breast pump and bottle accessories. I even wash my baby's teethers and pacifiers in this. Fits perfectly in the top of my dishwasher. I can fit a lot in the basket and I don't have to put them in with my regular dishes.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stott

customer_reviews.title: love these, work for all baby stuff and small ...
customer_reviews.text: love these, work for all baby stuff and small containers, straws and all sorts of assorted childrens things including bath toys or other toys that need sanitizing..
customer_reviews.author: Sary_Monster

customer_reviews.title: Handy baskets
customer_reviews.text: I got these baskets to wash small parts for my Dr. Brown's baby bottles and breast pump parts. They are so handy and useful that I'm now using them for my Aquasana water bottle caps and a variety of other small washable items. One basket has an extra compartment for bottle nipples which is really handy. Overall great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: this is great for running through the dishwasher and not losing them ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have a lot of small items, this is great for running through the dishwasher and not losing them to the heating coil in the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Debora D.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Well designed, holds all bottle parts without issues. Variety of 3 baskets fits in both of our dishwashers in various spots, no problems. Baskets are flimsy but have yet to break and I think is because the plastic is very flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M

customer_reviews.title: Must Have, Ordered Twice
customer_reviews.text: I was (possibly needlessly) a little concerned about some of our small lightweight bottles flying around the dishwasher. The deep basket easily holds a few of our 4-6 ounce bottles, keeping them in place and upright. I love washing pacifiers in the bottom section of the two-part basket. I ordered a second set. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cooke

customer_reviews.title: What's not to love.
customer_reviews.text: As an expectant mother, I have been cleaning all of my new baby products. I quickly realized that I needed something to put pacifiers and smaller items in, so I could just throw them in the dishwasher. These baskets are perfect for this. I bought this product with a drying tree, so I could just put the bottles and products on the drying tree after they come out of the dishwasher, and then I can relax! These are the kinds of things you never think to register for, but is essential to daily life!
customer_reviews.author: PB Max

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am using mostly the largest basket and occasionally some of the smaller ones. It holds out very well in dishwasher. Good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: wisteria books

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as the competing brand
customer_reviews.text: I don't really like these dishwasher baskets. I also have the munchkin brand, and it is much sturdier. The Lion baskets are not as sturdy, they are flimsy and don't close easily due to the flimsy quality. I don't even use these anymore because the munchkin is so much better.
customer_reviews.author: The.VerdictTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Not That Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I've used the small round one in the dishwasher twice and the clasp that keeps the cover closed snapped off. The hinge seems tight so it might stay closed enough even without the clasp but they're definitely not as sturdy as I'd imagined.
customer_reviews.author: MandaB

customer_reviews.title: Lid does not stay on or stay closed
customer_reviews.text: The lid for the largest basket in this set does not stay on, thus defeating the purpose of it. The hinges are open, every time you do manage to close the lid, when you open it, the entire thing comes off. It's hard to rescue and close.
customer_reviews.author: Mrshall226

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money! So glad I purchased this set!
customer_reviews.author: Dani Waters

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well for bigger bottles
customer_reviews.text: The baskets take up a lot of room. The basket that holds the nipples only will hold smaller ones/brands well. The basket for the sip cup valves works well for us. Over all I think I would rather of had one basket that was a little bigger than these.
customer_reviews.author: Caliwakechick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I can wash all the bottle, binkie, and breast pump things at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: Richard O.

customer_reviews.title: A complete necessity for cleaning bottle parts
customer_reviews.text: I use these every single day. They easily hold 6 nipples (I use Tommee Tippee, and Philips Avent bottles) as well as the rings. I also put pacifiers in the upper portion. A real time saver.
customer_reviews.author: Idaho Reader

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for baby stuff and other little things that need washing.
customer_reviews.author: Ritz

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and cheap
customer_reviews.text: So cheap. The flimsy basket lids don't stay in the flimsy hinges and need to be reattached every time I open the basket. I still use these, and having dishwasher baskets is a great idea, but I wish I had something sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: stoweaway

customer_reviews.title: kinda like a chip bag clip
customer_reviews.text: Really flimsy, so much so that it will not even stay latched closed, and also the round one has a part you pinch to open, kinda like a chip bag clip, and it goes down the side of the dishwasher rack, it broke when i tried to put it on. Hadnt even used it yet and it broke. But nice to have for small parts any how.
customer_reviews.author: katie v.

customer_reviews.title: Every busy mom needs one!
customer_reviews.text: I love the two large baskets that come with this set. They are so helpful when it comes to cleaning up after a toddler that is constantly making more messes throughout the day! The baskets easily accomodate those take n toss lids, which we use on a daily basis. I would recommend this baskets to every new mom that just can't find the time to get all of the dishes done, especially the ones that are continually seen piling up in the kitchen sink such as bottles and sippy cups.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: I've seen cheaper baskets that get the job done
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is meant to do BUT not worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Carla Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing exciting about this product, but it seems like it will do the job! I'm not sure what I'll put in the round cup that can hang on the shelf, but maybe something will come up for it.
customer_reviews.author: SHie

customer_reviews.title: Must have for moms!
customer_reviews.text: A must have for every bottle-feeding mom!! The whole set is the way to go!! I use these every day and they have held up well after 4 months of heavy use!
customer_reviews.author: bluGeneGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great product for mega cheapy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for baby bottles, nipples, & toppers. So far, so good with quality. I didn't expect much for so cheap but wow! Definitely exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Bailey

customer_reviews.title: holds all kinds of things
customer_reviews.text: maybe the best thing about them is that there is no metal! the last one we had was metal and peeled and made the dishwasher drain a real mess to clean out. we wash all kinds of things in them
customer_reviews.author: Samyel F

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed that my chopsticks just fall straight through the holes. Not ideal for chopsticks
customer_reviews.author: chicas

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I don't use the round thing (I guess it's for sippy cups), but I use the other two for Dr Brown bottles and Medela pumping supplies. No complaints so far, it just does what it should!
customer_reviews.author: ABG

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it's a great idea.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't quite work the way we thought. Stuff inside tummbles around and traps water... Otherwise it's a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: sgtbluefire

customer_reviews.title: These baskets work great, and I love that the big basket fits ...
customer_reviews.text: These baskets work great,and I love that the big basket fits 5oz. Medela bottles.
customer_reviews.author: M&K F

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super handy for all of the pieces of bottles, sippy cups, and my breast pumps.
customer_reviews.author: twinmama

customer_reviews.title: was as expected except that the dishwasher attachment snapped in ...
customer_reviews.text: was as expected except that the dishwasher attachment snapped in half as soon as I tried to use it.
customer_reviews.author: gabi

customer_reviews.title: We love having multiple baskets so that we can rotate between ...
customer_reviews.text: We love having multiple baskets so that we can rotate between dirty basket and clean basket. My sister-in-law suggested this to us as it works for her too.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Prefect basket for dishwasher!
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect! Fits all different sizes and doesn't rust like some of the metal ones. I highly recommend for anyone - even those without kids - I don't have kids and it is just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace a large basket that I lost when we were moving. The quality of these isn't great, but the price is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I use theses baskets to wash all my pumping items. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Lavariega

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great with Avent bottles. I set fits 3 bottles. The round thing is useless though.
customer_reviews.author: e

customer_reviews.title: Saves so much time!
customer_reviews.text: No need to wash bottles and accessories anymore, fits perfectly in most dishwashers.
customer_reviews.author: Olmcb

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! I'm using the larger basket in the top rack of my dishwasher for my breast pump accessories. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: J. Shetrone

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and perfect for baby items. Great to be able to wash small items in the dishwasher and not by hand anymore.
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: Makes washing small bottle parts and baby food jar lids ...
customer_reviews.text: Makes washing small bottle parts and baby food jar lids so much easier. I haven't used the round one yet.
customer_reviews.author: Erin C.

customer_reviews.title: avoids bottles and bottle parts from being tossed around the washer
customer_reviews.text: good to have when cleaning baby bottles, toys, pacifiers in the dishwasher. keeps them from falling to the bottom of the machine.
customer_reviews.author: e

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: They break after a few used. They ones I bought over two years ago are better then these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I bought them in order to put too-small items through the dishwasher like lids for reusable beverage containers and water bottles. I also can use them for lids, tea baskets, plumbing fixtures, and so on. The baskets are large and close easily - they also stay closed through the whole dishwasher cycle. The grate on the baskets is also spread wide enough that I haven't had a problem putting it on the top shelf in my dishwasher, either. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Marigold

customer_reviews.title: NOT EXACTLY WHAT I NEEDED
customer_reviews.text: What I needed was something to put small plastic items in to wash in the dishwasher. I don't have any babies nor do I ever expect to have or want any, so I was looking for a type of basket for measuring cups and the such. the round one would have been excellent if it was and open basket that I could put a cup or two in. The large one is to big and the medium on has all those dividers and such that take up too much of the basket. Well it was worth a try may use them on occasion but most likely they will be stuffed away collecting dust.
customer_reviews.author: Robearx

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These baskets are great for misc items that we have for our newborn son. We use for his pacifiers and bottle and pumping accessories. I would recommend to any mother with small children.
customer_reviews.author: msels

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They're a Lot bigger than I expected. Hope they fit OK.
customer_reviews.author: Trish in France

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Received product dirty and broken. The lid of one of the boxes doesn’t snap on. After closer inspection the hinge part that should snap in place is broken.
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Work well, just a little bulky and take up ...
customer_reviews.text: Work well, just a little bulky and take up enough space on top rack. But they do the trick for what I need them for.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Stoffel

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of using this in my dishwasher to keep the baby's things separate, but to be honest, I usually on use the bigger basket..
customer_reviews.author: Byron D. Wright

customer_reviews.title: convenience
customer_reviews.text: So convenient to use. I can sanitize so many little toys that the grandkids play with. The larger basket doesn't fit very many places in the dishwasher, but it still works.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Great deal compared to competitors.
customer_reviews.text: The valve basket is pretty much useless unless you have parts that fit exactly -- but this set of three was cheaper than most other sets of two or buying singles. Fits pacifiers, bottle filters, and nipples easily, as well as bottle caps. Been used heavily in our household and seem to stand up well to daily use/wear and tear. Having these baskets allowed us to use our dishwasher space more efficiently and go longer in between bottle washings.
customer_reviews.author: ABL

customer_reviews.title: At Last !!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I searched every store on the planet trying to find these. I had several small items that everytime I used them I had to handwash them (and I don't like that !!). Since they arrived I have kept the middle sized one in my dishwasher and use it everytime I turn it on. I am learning that I should check Amazon FIRST!!!!! Carolyn Greene
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Greene

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose very well!
customer_reviews.text: These have stood up very well in our dishwasher and hold all of our baby's bottles and parts. A must have!!
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: Works Well, No Problems
customer_reviews.text: All baby bottle supplies fit fine with no issues. Seems sturdy, items come out clean. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: C. Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Great product but wish it didn't have a separate compartment for the nipples underneath the main compartment.
customer_reviews.text: This basket system works well. My only complaint is the nipples don't fit in the designated area at the bottom. I use Avent & Dr. Browns bottles, so I had to put all of the pieces in the main compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Jen S.

customer_reviews.title: MADE IN THE USA!! Yea!!!
customer_reviews.text: Holds all my baby bottle parts and best part-MADE IN THE USA!!!
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: Warped in Dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. One of the baskets warped after one run in the dishwasher. It now does not snap close.
customer_reviews.author: travel.light

product_meta.title: Prince Lionheart Complete Dishwasher Basket System
product_meta.description:
The Prince Lionheart dishwasher basketSYSTEM is all you will need to clean, sanitize and rinse, nipples, collars, pacifiers, teething toys, spill-proof cup parts and more--from Infant to Toddler. The infant basket holds nipples and bottle parts directly above water jets for thorough sanitizing. The toddler basket accommodates larger feeding accessories and hard-to-clean kitchen gadgets. Made in the USA from 100% recycled material.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Dishwasher Basket Combo is the ONLY system you will need to clean, sanitize and rinse, nipples, collars, pacifiers, teething toys, spill-proof cup parts and more--from Infant to Toddler.
feature_bullets: Includes patented infant basket, toddler basket and spill proof cup valve cleaner
Baskets are top rack dishwasher safe
100% Recycled Plastic Made in the USA
